lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin Ascrj AscrjmY kotin kotwin ibsmwid ibsmwd hY
lines.transliteration_english: Kotani Kotaani Asacharaj Asacharajamai , Kotani Kotaani Bisamaadi Bisamaad Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of astonishments are feeling astonished at the grandeur of a Guru-conscious person who has been able to achieve union of mind and Guru's words in the holy gathering. Millions of trances are feeling surprised and astonished.

lines.gurmukhi: AdBuq prmdBuq huie kotwin koit gdgd hoq koit Anhd nwd hY
lines.transliteration_english: Adabhout Paramadabhout Hui Kotaani Koti , Gadagad Hot Koti Anahad Naad Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of strangenessâ€™s are feeling astonished. Millions of tunes are feeling pleasure and ecstasy listening to the unstruck melody of the word in the consciousness.

lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin aunmnI gnI jwq nhI kotin kotwin koit suMn mMflwid hY
lines.transliteration_english: Kotani Kotaani Ounamanee Ganee Jaat Nahee , Kotani Kotaani Koti Sounn Mandalaadi Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Millions of states of knowledge become redundant before the ecstasy of the engrossment of the united state of the word and consciousness.

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK sbd suriq ilv swDsMig AMq kY AnMq pRBu Awid prmwid hY ]250]
lines.transliteration_english: Gurmukhi Sabad Surati Liv Saadhasangi , Ant Kai Anant Prabhu Aadi Paramaadi Hai ?250?

Shabad OS B.translation: A Guru-oriented person practices union of Guru's blessed words in his consciousness in the company of saintly persons. He focuses his mind on the Lord who is infinite and sans beginning. (250)
